# Number of Bytes

> Size (in bytes) of an 8-bit signed integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var INT8_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-num-bytes' );
```

#### INT8_NUM_BYTES

Size (in bytes) of an 8-bit signed integer.

``` javascript
INT8_NUM_BYTES === 1;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var INT8_NUM_BYTES = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-num-bytes' );

console.log( INT8_NUM_BYTES );
// => 1
```
